trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control that enables the user to select a date using a visual monthly calendar display.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用户能够选择使用可视月历显示日期的 Windows 控件。

trans-unit.source: The MonthCalendar control allows the user to select a date using a visual display.
trans-unit.target: MonthCalendar 控件允许用户选择使用以可视方式显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the date and times that can be selected by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以限制日期和时间，可以通过设置选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置更改控件的日历部分的查找范围<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control only supports Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件仅支持公历日历。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control only supports Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件仅支持公历日历。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>

trans-unit.source: The MonthCalendar control is drawn by the operating system, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint> event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: MonthCalendar 控件绘制由操作系统，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint>永远不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.Paint>

trans-unit.source: If you need to provide a customized look to the MonthCalendar control, you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> method, call the base implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>, and then perform custom painting.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要提供自定义信息，请参阅 MonthCalendar 控件，则应重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>方法，调用基实现的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>，然后执行自定义绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need custom date formatting and a selection limited to just one date, you might consider using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control instead of a MonthCalendar.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要自定义日期格式设置和选择限制为只用于一个日期，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件而不是 MonthCalendar。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> eliminates much of the need for validating date/time values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>措施来减少你需要验证日期/时间值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>

trans-unit.source: For more information on month calendar controls, see [Month Calendar Control Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息月月历控件，请参阅[月日历控件引用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day that is displayed in bold on an annual basis in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 添加显示在一天在月历中一年的基础上以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法以更新显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>

trans-unit.target: 若要在一次分配中添加多个日期，你可以分配的数组<xref:System.DateTime>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 要以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day to be displayed in bold in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 添加一天，以显示在月历中以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple dates in a single assignment, you can assign an array of <xref:System.DateTime> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在一次分配中添加多个日期，你可以分配的数组<xref:System.DateTime>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The date to be displayed in bold.
trans-unit.target: 要以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adds a day that is displayed in bold on a monthly basis in the month calendar.
trans-unit.target: 添加显示在一天在月历中的每月的基础上以粗体显示。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A> method afterward to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>方法以更新显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.UpdateBoldedDates%2A>

trans-unit.target: 要以粗体显示的日期。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数组<xref:System.DateTime>确定每年的哪几天要以粗体显示的对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，你可以分配每年以粗体显示日期的数组。

trans-unit.source: When you assign an array of dates, the existing dates are first cleared.
trans-unit.target: 当分配的日期数组时，将首先会清除现有的日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>属性不支持透明的颜色，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>属性是一个环境属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns and rows of months displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示月份的列数和行数。

trans-unit.source: Only one calendar year is displayed at a time, and the maximum number of months that can be displayed is 12.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个日历年会显示一次，并最大的可显示的月数为 12。

trans-unit.source: Valid combinations of columns and rows make a maximum product of 12; for values greater than 12, the display is modified on a best-fit basis.
trans-unit.target: 有效组合的列和行进行 12; 最大产品对于值大于 12，显示修改在最佳的基础上。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.target: 检索表示控件所显示日期的最低和最高限制的日期信息。

trans-unit.target: GetDisplayRange 方法返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>包含控件的当前视图中显示的开始和结束日期。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the returned range based on the value you specify for the `visible` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改返回为指定的值的范围`visible`参数。

trans-unit.source: By specifying `false`, you can retrieve all dates displayed on the control; specifying `true` retrieves only those dates that are part of fully displayed months.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定`false`，你可以检索显示在控件; 上的所有日期指定`true`检索属于完全显示的月份的日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of days that can be selected in a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置月历控件中可选择最大天数。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not effect the current selection range.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性不会影响当前的选择范围。

trans-unit.source: It is important to remember that the MaxSelectionCount property represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 务必要记住 MaxSelectionCount 属性表示的所选内容，不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>之间的差异的天数

trans-unit.source: For example, if MaxSelectionCount is 7 (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 MaxSelectionCount 为 7 （默认值）、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>之间能不能超过六天。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of days that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择最大天数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 7.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 7。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 值是小于 1。

trans-unit.source: -or- The MaxSelectionCount cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: -或者-MaxSelectionCount 不能设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否从右到左布局。

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is useful for international applications where the language is written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: RightToLeftLayout 属性可用于国际应用程序语言写入从右到左的位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> and RightToLeftLayout properties are both `true`, Mirroring will be turned on for the form, and control placement and text will be from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>和 RightToLeftLayout 属性均`true`、 镜像将为窗体中，开启和控件放置和文本将从右到左。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is laid out from right to left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件从右到左; 的布局否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scroll rate for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置月历控件的滚动率。

trans-unit.source: The scroll rate is the number of months that the control moves its display when the user clicks a scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: 控件移动显示，当用户单击滚动箭头的月份数的滚动率。

trans-unit.source: If this value is 0, the number of months is reset to the default, which is the number of months displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为 0，则会将的月数重置为默认情况下，在控件中显示的月份数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value is 20,000.
A positive number representing the current scroll rate in number of months moved.
trans-unit.target: 移动的月份数表示当前滚动率的正数。

trans-unit.source: The default is the number of months currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是的月数当前显示。

trans-unit.source: The maximum is 20,000.
The value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value is greater than 20,000.
Gets or sets the end date of the selected range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选定日期范围的结束日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the SelectionEnd property to a date that is earlier than the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is automatically set equal to SelectionEnd.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 SelectionEnd 属性的值设置日期早于的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>自动设置为等于 SelectionEnd。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set a date in SelectionEnd that causes the selection to exceed the number of days specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is adjusted; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> is automatically set so that the number of days selected is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在使所选内容超过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性指定的天数的 SelectionEnd 中设置日期，都将调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>值;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>自动集以便的天数选择等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and SelectionEnd.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>表示所选内容，不之间的差异的最大天数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和 SelectionEnd。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and SelectionEnd can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>是 7 （默认值），然后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和 SelectionEnd 能不能超过六天相隔。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> indicating the last date in the selection range.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>指示选择范围中的最后日期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The date value is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate*> value. -or- The date value is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate*> value.
trans-unit.target: 日期值小于<> *1> 值。 -或-日期值大于<> *1> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected range of dates for a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选定的月历控件的日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is functionally equivalent to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性在功能上等效于使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置分别设置开始和结束日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the start and end dates by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values of the SelectionRange property.
trans-unit.target: 你无法通过设置更改的开始和结束日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A?displayProperty=fullName>SelectionRange 属性的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You should use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> is greater than its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property value, the dates are swapped; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property value becomes the starting date, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property value becomes the end date.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>大于其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值，将交换日期;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值将成为开始日期，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>属性值将成为结束日期。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 滚动通过显示日历导航按钮时选择范围可能会导致意外的结果 （例如，日期范围不会保留）。

trans-unit.source: If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar to March changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有单个月份与 04/01/2001 到 2001-04-10 范围一起显示，滚动到年 3 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围︰ 03/01/2001 到 2001-03-10。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个月份显示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月并且选定日期范围的 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001，滚动回年 1 月和年 2 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围︰ 01/01/2001 到 2001-01-10。

trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置为 SelectionRange<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start date of the selected range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选定日期范围的开始日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the SelectionStart property to a date that is later than the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is automatically set equal to SelectionStart.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置 SelectionStart 属性的值为晚于当前值的日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>自动设置为等于 SelectionStart。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set a date in SelectionStart that causes the selection to exceed the number of days specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> property, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is adjusted; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> is automatically set so that the number of days selected is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在使所选内容超过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>属性指定的天数的 SelectionStart 中设置日期，都将调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>值;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>自动集以便的天数选择等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> represents the number of days in the selection, not the difference between SelectionStart and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>表示所选内容，不 SelectionStart 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>之间的差异的最大天数</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A> is 7 (the default), then SelectionStart and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> can be no more than six days apart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>是 7 （默认值），然后 SelectionStart 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>之间能不能超过六天。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>指示选择范围中的第一个日期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of columns and rows of months to display.
trans-unit.target: 设置的列数和要显示的月份的行数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of months that you can display is 12, restricted to one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: 最大可以显示的月数为 12，限于一个日历年。

trans-unit.source: The product of the `x` and `y` parameters should be 12 or less.
trans-unit.target: 产品`x`和`y`参数应为 12 或更少。

trans-unit.source: For values of `x` and `y` that have a product of more than 12, the greater of the `x` and `y` values will be iteratively reduced until the product is 12 or less.
trans-unit.target: 值`x`和`y`具有多个 12，较大的那个产品`x`和`y`值将以迭代方式降低产品之前 12 或更少。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns.
trans-unit.target: 列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 行数。

trans-unit.source: x or y is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: x或y小于 1。

trans-unit.source: Sets a date as the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: 将日期设置为当前选定的日期。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties to the specified date.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性与指定的日期。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is the functional equivalent of setting the selection range to a single day through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是在功能上等效的设置为一天，通过选择范围<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SetSelectionRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The date to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 要选择的日期。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than the minimum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: 值小于允许的最小日期。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value is greater than the maximum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: -或者-值大于最大日期。

trans-unit.source: This exception will only be thrown if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate*> have been set explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅会引发此异常<> *1> 或<> *1> 显式设置了。

trans-unit.source: Sets the selected dates in a month calendar control to the specified date range.
trans-unit.target: 在月历中的选定的日期控件设置为指定的日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Using this method is functionally equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法在功能上等效于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置分别设置开始和结束日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the `date1` parameter greater than the `date2` parameter, both dates are set to the `date1` value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置`date1`参数大于`date2`参数，这两个日期设置为`date1`值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 滚动通过显示日历导航按钮时选择范围可能会导致意外的结果 （例如，日期范围不会保留）。

trans-unit.source: If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有单个月份与 04/01/2001 到 2001-04-10 范围一起显示，滚动日历回滚更改所选的范围，如下所示︰ 03/01/2001 到 2001-03-10。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个月份显示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月并且选定日期范围的 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001，滚动回年 1 月和年 2 月的日历，如下所示更改所选的范围︰ 01/01/2001 到 2001-01-10。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>已启用视觉样式的控件将导致不绘制在控件上的正确选择范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>

trans-unit.target: 选择范围的开始日期。

trans-unit.target: 选择范围的结束日期。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for active captions.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为活动标题的系统颜色。

trans-unit.target: 值不是有效<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that is used by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref> as today's date.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，由<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref>用作今天的日期。

trans-unit.source: By default, the TodayDate property returns the current system date, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TodayDateSet%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，TodayDate 属性返回当前系统日期，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TodayDateSet%2A>属性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TodayDateSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the TodayDate property sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TodayDateSet%2A> property to `true` and, from that point, the value returned by the TodayDate property is the one the user sets.
trans-unit.target: 设置 TodayDate 属性集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TodayDateSet%2A>属性`true`和从该点 TodayDate 属性返回的值是一个用户设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TodayDateSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> representing today's date.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>表示今天的日期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default value is the current system date.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为当前的系统日期。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than the minimum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: 值小于允许的最小日期。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value is greater than the maximum allowable date.
trans-unit.target: -或者-值大于最大日期。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The string includes the type and the string returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串包含的类型和返回的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示当前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the color of days in months that are not fully displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值不在控件中完全显示的月中日期的颜色。

trans-unit.source: When the calendar is displayed, some dates precede and some follow the months that are fully displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当显示日历时，某些日期早于，某些按照完全显示的月份。

trans-unit.source: Using the TrailingForeColor property, you can modify the color of the text for those dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TrailingForeColor 属性，可以修改这些日期的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值不是有效<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 重绘粗体格式的日期以反映的日期设置以粗体显示日期的列表中。

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateBoldedDates method to reflect changes made to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A> properties, either directly by modifying elements of the array or by using the add or remove methods provided to modify the date lists.
trans-unit.target: UpdateBoldedDates 方法用于反映所做更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>属性，直接通过修改该数组的元素中或通过使用添加或删除方法来提供要修改日期列出。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>
